DataElement.preferredName: Biomarker Biomarker Data float One Dimensional Array
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances) which serve as indices for health- and physiology-related assessments, such as disease risk, psychiatric disorders, environmental exposure and its effects, disease diagnosis, metabolic processes, substance abuse, pregnancy, cell line development, epidemiologic studies, etc_Objectively measurable phenotypic parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype, presence of biological substances) that characterize an organism's state of health or disease, likelihood of developing a disease, or response to a particular therapeutic intervention.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._Generic value domain for a single dimensional array with floating numbers as elements.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances) which serve as indices for health- and physiology-related assessments, such as disease risk, psychiatric disorders, environmental exposure and its effects, disease diagnosis, metabolic processes, substance abuse, pregnancy, cell line development, epidemiologic studies, etc_Objectively measurable phenotypic parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype, presence of biological substances) that characterize an organism's state of health or disease, likelihood of developing a disease, or response to a particular therapeutic intervention.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Measurable and quantifiable biological parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype distribution in a population, presence of biological substances) which serve as indices for health- and physiology-related assessments, such as disease risk, psychiatric disorders, environmental exposure and its effects, disease diagnosis, metabolic processes, substance abuse, pregnancy, cell line development, epidemiologic studies, etc

Concepts.definition: A characteristic that can be objectively measured and serves as an indicator for normal biologic processes, pathogenic processes, state of health or disease, the risk for disease development and/or prognosis, or responsiveness to a particular therapeutic intervention.

Property.preferredDefinition: Objectively measurable phenotypic parameters (e.g., specific enzyme concentration, specific hormone concentration, specific gene phenotype, presence of biological substances) that characterize an organism's state of health or disease, likelihood of developing a disease, or response to a particular therapeutic intervention.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

Concepts.definition: A characteristic that can be objectively measured and serves as an indicator for normal biologic processes, pathogenic processes, state of health or disease, the risk for disease development and/or prognosis, or responsiveness to a particular therapeutic intervention.
A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released workflow status per 7/13/09 request of VCDE following successful Silver Compatibility review.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a single dimensional array with floating numbers as elements._An orderly arrangement. (from the American Heritage Dictionary)

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An orderly arrangement. (from the American Heritage Dictionary)
